name: Happy Zunda-mochi Factory
description:
# Happy Zunda-mochi Factory

## Game Overview

- Drag to create a conveyor to ship zunda-mochi.

## Controls

- Left drag ... Create a conveyor
- Left click on the conveyor ... Change settings
- Double left click on a conveyor ... Delete a conveyor
- ESC ... Cancel, open various menus
